entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as a character who has been tied up by Harry. He thanks Harry and then asks for proof that he believes Harry's story.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who untied Lupin. He is also mentioned in the conversation about Scabbers.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as the one who clutched Scabbers closer to his chest when Lupin asked for him.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is introduced as Ron's pet rat. He is mentioned in the conversation about whether Pettigrew could turn into a rat and find Scabbers in Azkaban.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew is mentioned in the conversation as someone who might have turned into a rat to escape from Azkaban.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is introduced as someone who is being asked by Lupin how he found out about Pettigrew's escape from Azkaban.

relationships.description: Lupin thanks Harry for untieing him.
Lupin asks Sirius how he found out about Pettigrew's escape from Azkaban.
